restlib

Class RequestWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • restlib.Request
      • restlib.RequestWrapper

  • @Immutable
public class RequestWrapper
extends Request
    An implementation of Request which forwards all its method calls to another instance of Request. Subclasses should override one or more methods to modify the behavior of the backing Request as desired per the decorator pattern.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected RequestWrapper(Request delegate)
      Constructs an instance of RequestWrapper that forwards all method calls to delegate.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Optional<ChallengeMessage> authorizationCredentials()
      Returns the client's authorization credentials.
      Set<CacheDirective> cacheDirectives()
      Returns the set of all cache directives provided by the client.
      ConnectionInfo connectionInfo()
      Returns the connectionInfo associated with this request.
      ContentInfo contentInfo()
      Returns the connectionInfo associated with this request.
      ListMultimap<Header,String> customHeaders()
      Returns a ListMultimap containing any non-standard headers.
      Optional<Object> entity()
      Returns the request entity as an object if available.
      Set<Expectation> expectations()
      Returns the set of client Expectations.
      Optional<EmailAddress> from()
      Returns the from email address of the request.
      Optional<Integer> maxForwards()
      Returns the maximum number of times this request may be forwarded, if specified.
      Method method()
      Returns the http method of this request.
      Set<CacheDirective> pragmaCacheDirectives()
      Returns the set of all pragma cache directives provided by the client.
      RequestPreconditions preconditions()
      Returns the client request preconditions.
      ClientPreferences preferences()
      Returns the client's preferences for content negotiation.
      Optional<ChallengeMessage> proxyAuthorizationCredentials()
      Returns the client's proxy authorization credentials.
      Optional<Uri> referrer()
      Returns the URI of the referrer of this request.
      Uri uri()
      Returns the URI of this request.
      Optional<UserAgent> userAgent()
      Returns the clients user agent string.
